import axios from'axios';// ** GET Products
export var getProducts=function getProducts(params){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/ecommerce/products',{params:params}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_PRODUCTS',data:res.data,params:params});});};};// ** Add Item to Cart
export var addToCart=function addToCart(id){return function(dispatch,getState){return axios.post('/apps/ecommerce/cart',{productId:id}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'ADD_TO_CART',data:res.data});dispatch(getProducts(getState().ecommerce.params));});};};// ** GET Wishlist Items
export var getWishlistItems=function getWishlistItems(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/ecommerce/wishlist').then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_WISHLIST',data:res.data});});};};// ** DELETE Wishlist Item
export var deleteWishlistItem=function deleteWishlistItem(id){return function(dispatch){return axios.delete("/apps/ecommerce/wishlist/".concat(id)).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'DELETE_WISHLIST_ITEM',data:res.data});dispatch(getWishlistItems());});};};// ** GET Cart Items
export var getCartItems=function getCartItems(){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/ecommerce/cart').then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_CART',data:res.data});});};};// ** GET Single Product
export var getProduct=function getProduct(slug){return function(dispatch){return axios.get("/apps/ecommerce/products/".concat(slug)).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_PRODUCT',data:res.data});});};};// ** Add Item to Wishlist
export var addToWishlist=function addToWishlist(id){return function(dispatch){return axios.post('/apps/ecommerce/wishlist',{productId:id}).then(function(){dispatch({type:'ADD_TO_WISHLIST'});});};};// ** DELETE Cart Items
export var deleteCartItem=function deleteCartItem(id){return function(dispatch){return axios.delete("/apps/ecommerce/cart/".concat(id)).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'DELETE_CART_ITEM',data:res.data});dispatch(getCartItems());});};};
